pages.text: Ars Nouveau 1.11.5 Fixes!$(li)Pierce can now be used with effects like Break, Cut, Crush, and Harvest.$(li)New animated archwood textures$(li)Extra checks for helping the carbuncle get unstuck$(li)Fixes laggy glyph presses$(li)Fixes a crash with the Scribes Table$(li)Fixes a crash with Carbuncles and berries.
$(li)More tag support for apparatus recipes.$(li)Fixes mana gems for beacon payment
